title: Are the Wheels Coming Off at Ineos Grenadiers? Team Loses Performance Brainiac Bigham: ‘We Should Be Doing a Lot Better’
content:
Ineos Grenadiers signs veterans Jungels, Langellotti to mentor young talents while 'super team' rivals make moves securing proven winners and leaders.

Read the full article at Are the Wheels Coming Off at Ineos Grenadiers? Team Loses Performance Brainiac Bigham: ‘We Should Be Doing a Lot Better’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
